channel.title: All Registered Polls for the House of Commons
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the House of Commons

item.title: Opinion Poll by Redfield & Wilton Strategies, 12 August 2020 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Conservative Party: 314–364 seats
  • Labour Party: 209–256 seats
  • Liberal Democrats: 3–9 seats
  • Scottish National Party: 41–58 seats
  • Plaid Cymru: 0–4 seats
  • Green Party: 1 seats
